programme.desc: With Billy Howle, Kim Cattrall, Monica Dolan, Andrea Riseborough. The hunt is on to find the murderer of a wealthy glamorous heiress who is found dead in her London townhouse. Based on the short story by Agatha Christie.

They will finally leave - to Bulgaria, halfway to their dream destinations: Beirut for Marion, Biarritz for Ben. Without a precise plan and, as they will...
Category: Comedy

programme.title: Musique et cinéma : l'accord parfait
programme.desc: En prenant pour exemple des biopics ou des films musicaux où les acteurs n'ont pas peur de pousser la chansonnette sur grand écran, ce documentaire propose de fêter le cinéma en chansons, en évoquant les destins de stars et les secrets de fabrication des tubes.

programme.title: Les randonneurs
Les randonneurs
programme.desc: Directed by Philippe Harel. With Benoît Poelvoorde, Karin Viard, Géraldine Pailhas, Philippe Harel. Parisian friends (two brothers and their one-time girl friends) fly to Corsica for a mountain trek guided by the married lover of one of the women. Cora, nearly 30, goes because her psychic says she'll meet a man with a load on his shoulders, which she guesses is a backpack. Nadine goes to be with her lover, Eric, the trek's guide, who is married but promises to leave his wife and daughters soon....
